devdoc.author: ELYSIA
devdoc.details: The data pipeline contract is to help integrating the data of user and reserve in ELYFI. Each reserve has a seperate data pipeline.

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve

getReserveData(address).details: Returns the reserve's data for asset.

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve

getUserData(address,address).details: Returns the user's data for asset.

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve

devdoc.title: ELYFI Data Pipeline
